name: VIR-274.02 Verify that the color and category availability for the school can be managed via impex

userStory.narrative:
As a system, I require the ability to manage the categories and colors that each
school will be able to view on the shop.virco site via
impex so that I can control the consistency for the school.

title: VIR-274.02 Verify that the color and category availability for the school can be managed via impex
